marked w dots, no numbers. Lizards were active at 7:45 to 8:00, dirt road closes to site showed signs of use. Flags intact, orange flags were used to mark ibutton locations. Full cover sites were burrid in dirt and twigs beneath thick shrubs, many orange/black butterflis, dragonfly

many new brittlebrush seedlings, many new hatchlings.
Most annual forbs dried. Lizards seen off plot at 7:15 emerge. Spiny off plot prev Thursday. Courtship behavior observed 8-9 am, male pursing female.

Large dust storm building to SE. Hit site at 17:15, lasted 1 hr, then returned to survey post storm. Winds increased to 5-10 mph winds.. However, soil had dropped to 30 C and sun was behind clouds, light that did come through was weak.
